turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, can you order a couple Pizzas for lunch?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like it from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: How about Little Caesars?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Really?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, just kidding, can you order it from Franks?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, there's 2 locations, do you know which one?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nah, it doesn't matter, wherever you're closer too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You can pick it up right?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, what are you looking for?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, I was in the mood for some Pepperoni on one.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, what are you looking for on the 2nd.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well, what do you recommend?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Well if you're going to order from there, I recommend a Buffalo Chicken.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh, sounds interesting.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, the best part is it comes with a home-made Ranch dressing.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Really, sounds good to me. Pick up one of those too.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, what time do you want me to bring it over?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you do an hour and a half, I have some work to do first.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea sure can.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Wait one last question...

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yea, what is it?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What size do you want.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Well it will be for a couple clients, so can they do larges?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Yea, I think their 10 cuts, but their big.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sounds, good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I'll see you in a bit, bye!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks again, see you later!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: See ya!
